pgTitle: List of bridges on the National Register of Historic Places in Vermont

rows.text: Douglas & Jarvis Patent Parabolic Truss Iron Bridge
East Putney Brook Stone Arch Bridge
Follett Stone Arch Bridge Historic District
Town lattice truss Disassembled and stored awaiting restoration
Iron Bridge at Howard Hill Road
Town-Pratt dbl lattice truss Destroyed by arson 1987
Double-span through truss Removed. Moved to site of former Swanton Covered Railroad Bridge.
